title: WhatsApp
description: Chat, voice & video calls. Stay connected with friends and family around the world. Share photos, videos, and documents instantly. Create group chats and broadcast messages. Enjoy end-to-end encryption for secure conversations. Use WhatsApp Web to chat from your computer. Send voice messages or make conference calls effortlessly.

title: Google
description: Search, services & more. Find information quickly on the web. Access Google Maps, Gmail, and Drive seamlessly. Get personalized search results. Use Google Lens to explore visually. Discover news, weather, and trending topics. Explore Google Photos for storing and organizing memories. Use Google Assistant for hands-free help anytime.

title: Instagram
description: Photo & video sharing social network. Connect with friends and follow influencers. Share stories, reels, and posts easily. Explore trending hashtags and content. Engage with likes, comments, and direct messages. Use filters and editing tools for creative posts. Discover IGTV for long videos and shopping directly on the platform.

title: Twitter
description: Microblogging & social networking. Share thoughts and updates in short messages. Follow news, trends, and favorite personalities. Retweet, like, and comment on posts easily. Participate in live discussions with hashtags. Use Twitter Spaces for live audio conversations. Customize notifications and explore topics of interest daily.

title: Facebook
description: Social network, posts, groups, pages. Connect with friends, family, and communities. Share updates, photos, and videos effortlessly. Join groups and events to interact with people. Discover pages for entertainment, news, and hobbies. Use Marketplace to buy and sell products locally. Engage in live videos, polls, and stories with ease.

title: YouTube
description: Video sharing & streaming platform. Watch videos on any topic imaginable. Upload your own videos to share with the world. Subscribe to channels and get notifications for new content. Use playlists to organize favorite videos. Explore YouTube Shorts for quick, entertaining clips. Engage with comments, likes, and live streams. Discover educational tutorials and entertainment alike.

title: Apple
description: Technology & devices maker. Design and create innovative products like iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Develop software and services for seamless integration. Focus on user-friendly interfaces and premium build quality. Offer App Store with millions of applications. Provide customer support and repair services worldwide. Innovate in wearable devices like Apple Watch. Lead in ecosystem connectivity for smart devices.

title: Spotify
description: Music streaming & podcasts. Listen to millions of songs anytime and anywhere. Create playlists for personal moods and activities. Discover new artists with personalized recommendations. Enjoy podcasts on diverse topics from education to entertainment. Share music with friends and follow favorite artists. Use offline mode to enjoy content without internet. Integrate with smart speakers and devices for easy listening.

title: Dropbox
description: Cloud storage & file sharing. Store files securely and access them from any device. Share documents and folders with colleagues and friends. Collaborate in real-time with team members. Use Dropbox Paper for note-taking and project planning. Backup important files automatically. Sync files seamlessly across devices. Manage permissions and track changes efficiently.

title: LinkedIn
description: Professional networking. Connect with colleagues and industry professionals. Share your resume and achievements. Follow companies and stay updated with industry trends. Apply for jobs and receive recommendations. Post content and engage with professional communities. Use LinkedIn Learning for skill development. Network globally and enhance your career opportunities.

title: TikTok
description: Short video platform. Create and share short, engaging videos easily. Explore trending content from global creators. Use filters, effects, and music to enhance videos. Participate in challenges and trends for fun engagement. Follow favorite creators and receive updates. Interact with likes, comments, and duets. Discover educational, entertainment, and lifestyle content daily.

title: Telegram
description: Messaging with focus on speed & privacy. Send messages instantly with cloud-based sync. Share media and documents of any type securely. Create channels and groups for communities. Use secret chats with end-to-end encryption. Access messages across multiple devices. Utilize bots for automation and services. Customize themes, notifications, and stickers for personal experience.
